column2: Play a game of Dice Poker
Dice poker is an addictive game, played throughout the Continent
[FromFrom.GetFullName] wishes to play a game of dice poker.
No, I don't have time for this.
[From.GetFullName] has accepted my proposal to play a game of dice poker.
The dice are cast, let's see the results.
Let's see whether [From.GetFirstName] raises the bid.
Current dice: [Root.die1.GetValue] [Root.die2.GetValue] [Root.die3.GetValue] [Root.die4.GetValue] [Root.die5.GetValue]\n What to do with [Root.die.GetValue] ?
I've won this game with no combination !
This game ends in a draw... How rare !
I've lost to [From.GetFirstName]'s Six High Straight.
I've lost to [From.GetFirstName]'s Five High Straight.
Lost our last dice poker game
Won our last dice poker game
I'll have better luck next time.
